alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chemung; Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Southern Oneida; Tioga; Tompkins; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 22 at 8:00PM EST until December 24 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM FRIDAY TO NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 24 below zero. Winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In New York, Northern Oneida, Yates, Seneca, Southern Cayuga, Onondaga, Schuyler, Chemung, Tompkins, Madison, Southern Oneida, Cortland, Chenango, Tioga and Broome counties. In Pennsylvania, Susquehanna, Northern Wayne, Wyoming, Lackawanna, Luzerne, Pike and Southern Wayne counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM Friday to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. Tree limbs could be blown down and scattered power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A strong cold front will cross the region on Friday. A lull in the winds may occur Friday morning, but winds will pick up again after frontal passage and shift to the southwest. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. &&
